TEST_NAME: Pages should not have local CSS
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when aap.inline_css is null
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id, 
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format(
        p_message => q'^Page %0 (Application %1) has page-level inline CSS^',
        p0 => aap.page_id,
        p1 => aap.application_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format(
        p_message => q'^Remove page-level inline CSS (Page %0 /Application %1) ^',
        p0 => aap.page_id,
        p1 => aap.application_id) issue_title,
			 aap.build_option,
       abo.build_option_status,
       abo.status_on_export,
			 aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
from apex_application_pages aap
inner join v_apex_applications aa on aap.application_id = aa.application_id
                                  and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                   and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: All CSS should be centralized and kept out of local pages : Applications should consolidate CSS and not have CSS locally
